# Bugfix PR

## Summary
Provide a clear, comprehensive description of the bug including environment, versions and steps to reproduce.

## Observed Behaviour
What happens now (logs, stack traces etc.).

## Expected Behaviour
What should happen instead.

## Root Cause
Explain why the bug happens (root cause analysis).

## Changes
Explain the changes introduced by this PR and how they fix the root cause. Include trade-offs, limitations or alternative approaches considered.

## Backwards compatibility / Regression
Does this change alter existing behaviour or public APIs? If so, describe the impact and migration steps.
